scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && bun run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "cd backend && uv run uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && bun run preview"
